relevant_findings.general: No scleral icterus, neck is atraumatic and any color.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, good air movement.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs/rubs/gallops, S4 heart sound present.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Bowel sounds present, wounds consistent with laparoscopic gastric bypass, abdomen soft, non-tender, non-distended, palpable gallbladder, no other masses.
